alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jefferson, north central Taylor and southwestern Madison Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 255 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 16 miles south of Monticello, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lamont, Waukeenah, Capps, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Eridu, Cabbage Grove and Thomas City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
